original: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ
dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ
paṭicca namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
namaggārammaṇo ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ
dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti
hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati
Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa, ārammaṇe chabbīsa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
